nodes.documentation: @title Splitting of Alice' ethereum for the Blockstars course.
nodes.name: Splitter
setCustomer

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Both customers have to be set."

arguments.value: Both customers have to be set.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Both customers have to be set."

nodes.documentation:
Assign half of the localbalance to the Customers
If the localbalance doesn't split even it is reduced until it splits even
Update the localbalance.

@return true on success
nodes.name: split

nodes.documentation:
Currently set customers can Withdraw their funds there

      * @return true on success
